data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliva, Adriana, Short, Andrew E. Z. (2012): Review of the Berosus Leach of Venezuela (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae, Berosini) with description of fourteen new species. ZooKeys 206: 1-69, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.206.2587, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.206.2587
